r.s: PHP_CodeSniffer tokenises PHP code and detects violations of a defined set of coding standards.
r.d: PHP_CodeSniffer is a PHP5 script that tokenises and "sniffs" PHP code to detect violations of a defined set of coding standards. It is an essential development tool that ensures that your code remains clean and consistent. It can even help prevent some common semantic errors made by developers.
r.n: - Added unit tests for all PEAR sniffs - Exception class now extends from PEAR_Exception - Fixed summary report so files without errors but with warnings are not shown when warnings are hidden
